sentences.sContent: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.sCn: 如果没有真菌，这里将成为另一个沙洲。

sentences.sContent: The group also reported the dusky and sandbar sharks as being threatened.
sentences.sContent_eng: The group also reported the dusky and sandbar sharks as being threatened.
sentences.sCn: 该组织还报告了灰鲨和沙洲鲨也正受到威胁。

sentences.sContent: Low water bares gray strips of sandbar on which the natives build tiny palm-thatch shelters for overnight fishing trips.
sentences.sContent_eng: Low water bares gray strips of sandbar on which the natives build tiny palm-thatch shelters for overnight fishing trips.
sentences.sCn: 水浅的地方露出灰茫茫的狭长沙洲，土著人在沙洲上为过夜的渔夫搭建了小小的棕榈茅舍。

trans.tranOther: A sandbar is a sandbank which is found especially at the mouth of a river or harbour
